sectionSubtitle: A proven, outcome-focused process for business challenges

steps.title: Define the problem
steps.desc: Pinpoint the problem statement and clarify what needs to be solved.

steps.title: Identify root cause of problem
steps.desc: Investigate the root causes and underlying issues.

steps.title: Develop alternative solutions
steps.desc: Create multiple solutions and consider different approaches.

steps.title: Select solution
steps.desc: Choose the most effective solution for the problem.

steps.title: Implement the solution
steps.desc: Plan and implement the chosen solution.

steps.title: Evaluate the outcome
steps.desc: Determine if the root cause is eliminated and measure results.
